name: Roborgs
description:
This is a little game demo I threw together in three days with Construct 2's free trial. I'm going to have to start all over in Multimedia Fusion 2, since I actually paid for that and can't afford a Construct license! Oh well!

Z and X to shoot, arrows or WASD to move

Art by Alex H

Music by Matt H

SFX and Game by Jeff K

Roborgs created by Jeff K and Alex H
